events.message: I just received the laptop I ordered last week, but unfortunately it has a large scratch on the lid and the screen flickers intermittently.
The system has identified the issue as related to a product defect due to reports of damage and faulty parts.
Your case has been assigned to one of our product support agents who will assist you with the damaged item.
Hello! I’m very sorry to hear about the damage to your laptop. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please send us photos of the scratches and the flickering screen? Also, confirm if you are available for a video call to diagnose further.
I have attached several photos showing the scratch and the screen issue, and I am available this afternoon for a video call if needed.
Thank you for the photos. We will send you a replacement unit right away and arrange a courier to collect the defective laptop from your address.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the replacement soon.
Your replacement laptop was delivered today and the defective unit has been collected. Please let us know if everything is working perfectly now.
Just checking in to ensure your new laptop is functioning well and that you are satisfied with the resolution provided.
Since we have not heard back, we will now close this case. Thank you for your patience and please reach out if you need further assistance.
